participant_1.name: Emily

participant_1.background: i've one brother. i live in alabama. i love dogs. i've three sisters. i like tacos.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and creative, Jake is determined to make his mark as a writer and often reflects on his rural upbringing.
participant_2.background: i want to be a lawyer. my family has raised horses for a generations. i'm from a small town. i was raised on a horse farm. i dream of moving to the city.
